name: Muffin de Ar√°ndanos
description: Developed to boost the incredible flavor from FLV Blueberry Muffin, with a dense and buttery bakery base with notes of vanilla and a brighter and sweeter jammy blueberry top note.
author: NaCHeF

reviews.text: Wow this is awesome! To me this is very similar to the Diner one shot Strawberry Donut flavor but with blueberry instead. I'm so glad I finally picked up flv blueberry muffin, idk why I waited so long to get it. This stuff wont leave my rotation any time soon, thanks Nachef! I love a good fruity desert mix that doesn't need sweetener
